name: WorldSaddestCryMachine
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cry machine
des:
World Saddest Cry Machine Saying I don't want to cry. Please don't make me cry again.

Alexa, Open Cry Machine.
Alexa, Ask cry machine to start cry.
Alexa, Ask cry machine to start crying.
Alexa, Ask cry machine to do crying.
Alexa, Ask cry machine to make cry.
Alexa, Ask cry machine to why are you crying.
Alexa, Ask cry machine to please crying.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
